JobFullDesc: Job Description:  Raytheon is seeking a Technical Director (TD) for the Tactical Communications Systems (TCS) product line, who is a dynamic and innovative communications technology expert, with proven and recognized leadership experience in multiple domains. The major role for this position is to provide technical leadership for the TCS product line managing all technical requirements spanning the development of TCS products, solving complex technical issues, establishing requirements compliance and providing technical direction to the team.  The TD will develop external customer relationships, partner with internal Business Development and Front End of the Business to pursue CRAD and contract opportunities.  Work with internal and external customers to define new strategic directions, guide staff on technology advancements, and provide expertise across the TCS product lines.  The TCS TD will Act as the main technical point of contact for CONOPS development, technology transitions, and technology maturation.  Creating and maintaining product and technology roadmaps that align to the Communication & Airspace Management Systems (CAMS) TCS business area plan.  Developing technologies and products that are reusable, scalable, and exportable.  Developing battle space network solutions that are unique for each customer / program.  The ideal candidate is someone with visionary thinking and leadership skills who will be the technical leader within the CAMS TCS product area, and will mentor other emerging technical leaders.The TCS TD will originate, develop and present technical briefings to internal leadership and internal and external customers. The TCS TD will provide technical direction to diversified teams and work closely with New Business Development in forming technology solutions for winning proposals and also lead creation of
